title: David Chester
text:
David "Dave" C. Chester (birth registered third ¼ 1946) is an English former <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> and professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who played in the 1970s. He played representative level rugby union for <a href="Lancashire%20County%20Rugby%20Football%20Union">Lancashire</a> (Trial), and at club level for <a href="Sandal%20RUFC">Sandal RUFC</a>, <a href="Rodillians%20R.U.F.C.">Rodillians</a> <a href="Rodillians%20RUFC">RUFC</a> and <a href="Orrell%20R.U.F.C.">Orrell R.U.F.C.</a>, and club level rugby league (RL) for <a href="Warrington%20Wolves">Warrington</a> (<a href="List%20of%20Warrington%20Wolves%20players">Heritage No. 734</a>), <a href="Wakefield%20Trinity">Wakefield Trinity</a> (<a href="List%20of%20Wakefield%20Trinity%20players">Heritage No. 811</a>), <a href="Keighley%20Cougars">Keighley</a> and <a href="Huddersfield%20Giants">Huddersfield</a>, as a , i.e. number 8 or 10.
Background.
David Chester's birth was registered in <a href="Wakefield">Wakefield</a> district, <a href="West%20Riding%20of%20Yorkshire">West Riding of Yorkshire</a>, England.
Playing career.
Club career.
David Chester changed <a href="rugby%20football">rugby football</a> codes from <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> to <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> when he transferred from <a href="Orrell%20R.U.F.C.">Orrell R.U.F.C.</a> to <a href="Warrington%20Wolves">Warrington</a> during September 1972, he made his début for <a href="Warrington%20Wolves">Warrington</a> on Sunday 29 October 1972, he played his last match for Warrington during the <a href="1972%E2%80%9373%20Northern%20Rugby%20Football%20League%20season">1972–73 season</a>, he made his début for <a href="Wakefield%20Trinity">Wakefield Trinity</a> during April 1975, and he played his last match for Wakefield Trinity during the <a href="1975%E2%80%9376%20Northern%20Rugby%20Football%20League%20season">1975–76 season</a>.
Genealogical information.
David Chester is the son of the rugby union and rugby league footballer; <a href="Charles%20Chester%20%28rugby%29">Charles Chester</a>
